metadata.Title: CVE-2022-1270 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description:
In GraphicsMagick, a heap buffer overflow was found when parsing MIFF.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-1270` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

graphicsmagick - 1.4+really1.3.38-1
graphicsmagick-imagemagick-compat - 1.4+really1.3.38-1
libgraphics-magick-perl - 1.4+really1.3.38-1
libgraphicsmagick++-q16-12 - 1.4+really1.3.38-1
libgraphicsmagick-q16-3 - 1.4+really1.3.38-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: graphicsmagick package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.4+really1.3.38-1').
